title: Conscription
description: Served as a conscripted soldier in the Vietnamese Army, gaining valuable life experience while honing discipline, teamwork, and resilience, and maintaining strong technical skills through self-study and personal projects during my service. You can read about my military service experience in detail in my Vietnamese blog series Tất tần tật về nghĩa vụ quân sự.

title: Madpoly studio - VNG Corporation
description: Worked with the title Associate Software Engineer, had to stop to fullfill my duty as a male Vietnamese citizen

title: RE
description: A startup that I temporarily work for as a web developer and helped build their main website

title: Freelancer apprenticeship
description: Assist a freelancer in his personal projects and freelancing projects, earn wisdom as well as experience from him and the projects along the way.

title: Ho Chi Minh City University of Science
description: I graduated from this university, where I gained valuable knowledge, cherished numerous happy memories, and studied in the Honors Program, achieving a GPA of 9.07/10.
